str2: A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
From zeo; properly, heat, i.e. 'zeal' (figuratively, of God), or an enemy, malice).

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To pursue, hence: I persecute. A prolonged form of a primary verb dio; to pursue; by implication, to persecute.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a compound of ek and a derivative of kaleo; a calling out, i.e. a popular meeting, especially a religious congregation.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
From a primary nemo; law, genitive case, specially, (including the volume); also of the Gospel), or figuratively.
Blameless, free from fault or defect. Irreproachable.
